title: Org Owner
description: Describes the relationship for a person owning an organization. The person can be either an accomplice or an insider to the incident.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "org-owner--" and is appended with a UUIDv4.

person.description: The id of the insider or accomplice who owns the organization.

org.description: The id of the organization object that is owned by the insider or accomplice.
